Subject: NTP Issue
Description: I have a problem with the NTP, the time appears out of date, although I have it well configured, can you tell me how I can correct it? I attach evidence. You can see that it appears that it is 9:16 but in reality with the mx.pool.ntp.org it was one hour before...
Solution_Comment__c: NTP was set in MST and it showed the correct time
